House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01586
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE ALTERNATIVE LEARNING SYSTEM IN THE BASIC EDUCATION FOR OUT-OF-SCHOOL CHILDREN, YOUTH AND ADULTS, PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES, INDIGENOUS PEOPLES, AND OTHER MARGINALIZED SECTORS OF SOCIETY, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide the out-of-school children, youth and adults, persons with disabilities, indigenous people, and other marginalized sectors of society with equally opportunities to improve their knowledge, technical and vocational efficiency, and other skills through systematic and flexible alternative basic education program outside of the formal school system.
ALIAS NAME : “Alternative Learning System Act of the Philippines.”
